actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: Makes three attacks: one bite and two tentacles.

actions.name: Bite
actions.description: On hit, DC 15 CON save vs disease or poisoned until cured; every 24 hours repeat DC 15 CON or max HP -5 (1d10) until cured; death at 0 max HP.

actions.name: Tentacle
actions.description: Medium or smaller target grappled (escape DC 13) and restrained; two tentacles can grapple one each.

actions.name: Tentacle Slam
actions.description: Slams grappled creatures together or into a surface; each must make DC 14 CON save or take 10 (2d6+3) bludgeoning and be stunned until end of otyugh's next turn (half damage, not stunned on success).
